name: Air Hares
description:
Air Hares is a top-down flyer in which Captain Rabbo must seed and water the barren carrot field while dodging attacks from the falcons of the Gale Gang. As Rabbo farms more carrots with each subsequent run, she'll upgrade her plane, develop new pilot abilities and turn Winrose, a desolate warren on the brink of starvation, into a fruitful and bustling metropolis, attracting new residents and recruits for the Air Hares.

THE STORY

The BLACK BLAZE, a dust cloud of unprecedented size and  magnitude, has ravaged the land and humankind has fled  indefinitely. In its wake lies a barren world where food is  scarce and life struggles to survive. Fertile fields that  once stretched into the horizon now wither away from unending  drought. 

Yet deep within the warren of WINROSE, a young bunny known as CAPTAIN RABBO SUNSKIPPER is determined to restore her adopted  home to its former fortune. Having recently stumbled upon an abandoned toy truck hauling RADIO CONTROLLED AIRPLANES, she’s outfit her craft to both seed and water the land’s fledgling carrot crop.  

But in refusing to yield to this desperate and oppressive world she’ll soon unleash not only the fury of the brutal GALE GANG, a pack of predators who personally enforce the  land’s natural pecking order, but also the brazen spirit of  her peers, who will join her side and take to the skies in  becoming...AIR HARES.

If you enjoy the demo, please visit our Kickstarter campaign to learn more about Air Hares and consider becoming a Bunny Backer so we can bring the full game to life!

Air Hares is raising support for a full PC game and digital graphic novel.
